actions.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 235 (Roll no. 74).
Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 235 (Roll no. 74).

description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 113-361 to exclude from the bill any rule, consent decree, or settlement agreement that the Director of the Office of Management and Budget determines would result in net job creation or whose benefits exceeds its costs.
purpose: Amendment sought to insert an exception for any rule, consent decree, or settlement agreement that the Director of the Office of Management and Budget determines would result in net job creation or whose benefits exceeds its costs.
